item.title: YAK8s 101: 1 | What is K8s? [Note]
item.description: What is K8s? | Kubernetes is a platform to orchestrate containers. It looks like this: ref: Kubernetes Documentation (Kubernetes Components). Accessed 8 Sep 2021, https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/components/
